sentence.Network_en: This onomatopoeic word suggests to me the sound a mousetrap makes when it snaps shut.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个拟声词让我想起捕鼠夹子突然合上时的声音。

sentence.Network_en: The mouse wondered - he was devastated to discover it was a mousetrap.

entry.def: A mousetrap is a small device that catches or kills mice.

means.word_mean: 2. (American football) a play in which a defensive player is allowed to cross the line of scrimmage and then blocked off as the runner goes through the place the lineman vacated
